backend/api/throttling.py.description: OrgRateThrottle class provides tier-based rate limiting using STRIPE_TIER_FEATURES. Uses Redis 'idempotency' cache for storage. Pattern: sliding window with history list in cache.

backend/api/throttling_mfa.py.description: MFA throttling uses per-token, per-user, and per-IP throttles. Only counts failures (success doesn't reset). Good pattern for API key creation throttle.

backend/config/settings/base.py.description: STRIPE_TIER_FEATURES dict defines per-tier limits: max_users, max_teams, api_rate_limit, audit_retention_days, sso_enabled, webhooks_enabled. Enterprise tier uses -1 for unlimited.
